title: Banned for no reason
body:
Hello,
I had a bad game, all my team was flaming me i said one insult, i logged of after the game and when i log in it says that my account have been permanently banned.
It's disgusting that i have been banned for only one poor game when i said almost nothing
here's the chat log

Game 1
Apornat: I think they want to counter me
Apornat: By playing 100% ad
Apornat: Xin and riven no f
Apornat: Why no gank top ?
Apornat: Free kill u know ?
Apornat: from a free kill ?
Apornat: ur making me int lee
Apornat: Riven is diving me without her flash
Apornat: and ur just farming jungle while watching me
Apornat: Ye
Apornat: r/ bloquer dans un elo de fils de pute
Apornat: m//mute all
Apornat: its ok worth it

Well ok i said an insult ok ok but well i've been really permently banned for this ?

Hope someone can fix it if possible.

replies.body: Hmmmmmm yea it looks like what was said in that line where you *meant* to type /reply may have been what flagged you. I can't promise anything, but I do suggest reaching out to our support in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's anything that can be done.

I actually have a question how long does it take for your report to take effect as in if someone was doing something against the regulations and you reported them how long until the notification that it did go through (if it does) will show?
Ok thanks i'll try to make a ticket :)
